statements: SELECT * FROM portfolio_performance;
SELECT id, date, portfolio_name FROM portfolio_performance WHERE market_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_performance WHERE date = '2022-05-25' AND stress_scenario = 'High';
SELECT portfolio_name, market_value FROM portfolio_performance WHERE market_value BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT id, date, stress_scenario FROM portfolio_performance ORDER BY date DESC, market_value ASC;
SELECT id, portfolio_name, market_value FROM portfolio_performance WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM portfolio_performance WHERE market_value >= 10000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT portfolio_name, stress_scenario FROM portfolio_performance WHERE market_value < 5000 ORDER BY market_value ASC;
SELECT id, portfolio_name, market_value FROM portfolio_performance WHERE stress_scenario LIKE '%COVID%';
SELECT AVG(market_value), MAX(market_value), MIN(market_value) FROM portfolio_performance WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Market_Stress_Scenarios
SELECT id, scenario_name, performance_metrics FROM Market_Stress_Scenarios
SELECT scenario_name, portfolio_id FROM Market_Stress_Scenarios WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM Historical_Data WHERE portfolio_value > 10000
SELECT date, market_index_value FROM Historical_Data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, scenario_name, portfolio_id, historical_data_id, performance_metrics FROM Market_Stress_Scenarios;
SELECT scenario_name, performance_metrics FROM Market_Stress_Scenarios WHERE portfolio_id = 100;
SELECT scenario_name, performance_metrics FROM Market_Stress_Scenarios ORDER BY performance_metrics DESC;
SELECT * FROM Historical_Data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT MAX(portfolio_value) AS max_portfolio_value, MIN(market_index_value) AS min_market_index_value FROM Historical_Data;
SELECT * FROM Portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_name, portfolio_value FROM Portfolio ORDER BY portfolio_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalData WHERE portfolio_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT MAX(closing_price) AS max_closing_price FROM HistoricalData;
SELECT scenario_name, date_created FROM MarketStressScenario WHERE stress_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM Portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_name, portfolio_value FROM Portfolio WHERE portfolio_value > 10000;
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name FROM Portfolio ORDER BY portfolio_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalData WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT scenario_name, MAX(stress_level) AS max_stress_level FROM MarketStressScenario GROUP BY scenario_name ORDER BY max_stress_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_stress_scenario;
SELECT scenario_name, created_at FROM market_stress_scenario WHERE id = 1;
SELECT database_name, storage_size FROM sql_database WHERE storage_size > 100;
SELECT data_type, data_value FROM historical_data WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT portfolio_name, portfolio_value, performance_date FROM portfolio_performance ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_stress_scenario ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT scenario_name, scenario_description FROM market_stress_scenario WHERE id > 10
SELECT portfolio_name, portfolio_value FROM portfolio_performance WHERE portfolio_value > 10000 ORDER BY portfolio_value ASC
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE data_type='sales' AND date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT database_name, storage_size, last_updated FROM sql_database ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT * FROM portfolio_performance;
SELECT date, stock_symbol, stock_price FROM portfolio_performance ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM portfolio_performance GROUP BY stock_symbol;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE closing_price > 100 ORDER BY date;
SELECT portfolio_id, date, stock_symbol FROM portfolio_performance WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_performance ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stock_symbol, stock_price FROM historical_data WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY closing_price ASC;
SELECT portfolio_id, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM portfolio_performance GROUP BY portfolio_id HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT portfolio_id, date FROM portfolio_performance UNION SELECT simulation_id, date FROM portfolio_simulation ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT scenario_name, stress_description FROM market_stress_scenarios WHERE stress_level = 5;
